text: The women's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 19 and 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Nataliya Pyhyda Iryna Shepetyuk Olena Chebanu Marina Maydanova ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Anna Radoszewska Daria Onyśko Dorota Dydo Małgorzata Flejszar ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Tanja Kuckelkorn Lisa Schorr Katja Wakan Nadine Hentschke ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
